tip: attractive to look at usually in a simple or delicate way : pleasant to look at or listen to
to look at and understand the meaning of letters, words, symbols, etc. : to read the words of (a book, magazine, etc.) : to speak aloud the words of (something written)

strong affection for another arising out of kinship or personal ties <maternal love for a child> (2) :  attraction based on sexual desire :  affection and tenderness felt by lovers (3):  affection based on admiration, benevolence, or common interests <love for his old schoolmates>
